io.github.protonmc.proton_checkstyle_checks

Class ModuleSuffixCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AutomaticBean
      • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractViolationReporter
        • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractCheck
          • io.github.protonmc.proton_checkstyle_checks.ModuleSuffixCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.Configurable, com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.Contextualizable

    public class ModuleSuffixCheck
extends com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractCheck

    A check that forces all subclasses of a configurable superclass to have a certain configurable suffix at the end of their name.

    This check is not used in proton.
    Since:
    2.0.0

      • visitToken

        public void visitToken(com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.DetailAST ast)
        Called for every TokenTypes.CLASS_DEF token.

        For each token, looks for an extends clause that contains superclass, and logs an error if the class name doesn't end with suffix

        Overrides:
        visitToken in class com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractCheck
        Parameters:
        ast - The token.
        See Also:
        superclass, suffix
